member.summary: The default middleware that the Bugsnag client will always run before running any user specified middleware and sending the error report.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Configuration

member.summary: Notify Bugsnag of the provided exception.

member.summary: The breadcrumbs for this client.

member.summary: The session tracking functionality for this client.

member.summary: The configuration for this client.

member.name: M:Bugsnag.IClient.BeforeNotify(Bugsnag.Middleware)
member.summary: Add a middleware function that will be called before a report is sent by the client.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.ApiKey
member.summary: The API Key that the Bugsnag client will submit error reports to the Bugsnag API.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.Endpoint
member.summary: The endpoint that Bugsnag will submit error reports to, this should default to https://notify.bugsnag.com

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.AutoNotify
member.summary: Determines if the client will automatically catch unhandled exceptions.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.ReleaseStage
member.summary: The release stage that the application is currently running in eg. development, staging, production etc.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.NotifyReleaseStages
member.summary: Filter error reports from being sent to Bugsnag unless the ReleaseStage property is included in this list

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.AppVersion
member.summary: The version of the application that Bugsnag will attach to error reports

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.AppType
member.summary: The type of application that is being run that Bugsnag will attach to error reports.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.ProjectRoots
member.summary: These will be used to strip the beginning of the file name from stack trace lines in order to produce uniform stack trace file names to aid in grouping.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.ProjectNamespaces
member.summary: These will be used to mark stack trace lines as being 'In Project' if the line occurs in one of the provided namespaces. This will aid in grouping.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.IgnoreClasses
member.summary: These will be used to filter exceptions from being sent to Bugsnag based on the Error Class of the exception. eg. "System.FileNotFoundException"

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.GlobalMetadata
member.summary: This can be used to include these values as metadata in all error reports submitted to Bugsnag.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.MetadataFilters
member.summary: Used to filter these keys from data being sent to Bugsnag.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.AutoCaptureSessions
member.summary: Should the client send session tracking information.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.SessionEndpoint
member.summary: The endpoint that the Bugsnag client will submit session data to.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.SessionTrackingInterval
member.summary: Used to determine how often to flush session data to Bugsnag.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.Proxy
member.summary: If provided will be used to send data to Bugsnag.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.IConfiguration.MaximumBreadcrumbs
member.summary: The maximum number of breadcrumbs to store per error report, evicted in a FIFO manner.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.IDelivery
member.summary: Used by Bugsnag clients to send serialized error reports to an endpoint.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.IFilterable
member.summary: An interface to mark payload objects as having filtering applied to them.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Middleware
member.summary: Signature for Bugsnag client middleware that can be used to manipulate the error report before it is sent.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.InternalMiddleware
member.summary: The middleware that is applied by default by the Bugsnag client.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.InternalMiddleware.ReleaseStageFilter
member.summary: Sets the Ignore flag to true if the configuration is setup so that the report should not be sent based on the release stage information.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.InternalMiddleware.RemoveProjectRoots
member.summary: Strips any provided project roots from stack trace lines included in the report.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.InternalMiddleware.DetectInProjectNamespaces
member.summary: Marks stack trace lines as being 'in project' if they are from a provided namespace.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.InternalMiddleware.CheckIgnoreClasses
member.summary: Ignore the report if any of the exceptions in it are included in the IgnoreClasses.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.InternalMiddleware.AttachGlobalMetadata
member.summary: Attaches global metadata if provided by the configuration to each error report.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.InternalMiddleware.ApplyMetadataFilters
member.summary:
Applies the configured metadata filters to specified sections of the report.
This is no longer used by the notifier and can be removed in the next major version bump.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.InternalMiddleware.DetermineDefaultContext
member.summary:
Uses a request if set on the report to provide a default context.
This is no longer used by the notifier and can be removed in the next major version bump. Replaced by code in

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.App
member.summary: Represents the "app" key in the error report payload.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.Breadcrumb
member.summary: Represents an individual breadcrumb in the error report payload.

member.name: M:Bugsnag.Payload.Breadcrumb.FromReport(Bugsnag.Payload.Report)
member.summary: Build a new breadcrumb from an error report. This is used to attach a previously occurring exception to the next error report.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.Code
member.summary: TODO: Do we want to include this? It will only work in development so may be confusing for users why it doesn't work in other environments

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.Device
member.summary: Represents the "device" key in the error report payload.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.Payload.Device.Hostname
member.summary: Resolve the hostname using either "COMPUTERNAME" (win) or "HOSTNAME" (*nix) environment variable.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.Event
member.summary: Represents a single event in a Bugsnag payload.

member.name: M:Bugsnag.Payload.Event.TrimExtraData
member.summary: Called if the payload size is too large to send, removes data so that the payload can be sent succesfully.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.Exceptions
member.summary: Represents a set of Bugsnag payload exceptions that are generated from a single exception by resolving the inner exceptions present.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.Exception
member.summary: Represents an individual exception in the Bugsnag payload.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.HandledState
member.summary: Represents the various fields that can be set in the "event" payload for showing the exceptions handled/unhandled state and severity.

member.name: M:Bugsnag.Payload.HandledState.ForUnhandledException
member.summary: Creates a HandledState object for an error report payload where the exception was not handled by the application and caught by a global error handler.

member.name: M:Bugsnag.Payload.HandledState.ForHandledException
member.summary: Creates a HandledState object for an error report payload where the exception was handled by the application and notified manually.

member.name: M:Bugsnag.Payload.HandledState.ForUserSpecifiedSeverity(Bugsnag.Severity)
member.summary: Creates a HandledState object for an error report payload where the exception was handled by the application and notified manually and the error severity was also passed in to override the default severity.

member.name: M:Bugsnag.Payload.HandledState.ForCallbackSpecifiedSeverity(Bugsnag.Severity,Bugsnag.Payload.HandledState)
member.summary: Creates a HandledState object for an error report payload where the severity for the exception was modified while running the middleware/callback.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.HandledState.SeverityReason
member.summary: Represents the "severityReason" key in the error report payload.

member.name: T:Bugsnag.Payload.Metadata
member.summary: Represents Metadata that can be attached to error reports sent to Bugsnag.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.Payload.NotifierInfo.NotifierInfoInstance
member.summary: A single instance of the current notifier info to attach to all error reports.

member.summary: Adds a key to the Bugsnag payload. If provided a null or empty string value will remove the key from the dictionary.

Filters an IDictionary using the provided filters.

member.name: F:Bugsnag.Payload.Report.MaximumSize
member.summary: The maximum size of the serialized payload which can be sent to Bugsnag. The report will be trimmed if it exceeds this size.

member.summary: Used to indicate to the Bugsnag client that this report should not be delivered.

member.name: P:Bugsnag.Payload.Report.Event
member.summary: The list of Bugsnag payload events contained in this report. There is usually only a single event per payload but the Bugsnag error reporting API supports/requires this key to be an array.

member.summary: THe endpoint to send the error report to.

member.summary: Represents the "request" key in the error report payload.

member.summary: Represents a set of Bugsnag payload stacktrace lines that are generated from a single StackTrace provided by the runtime.

member.name: T:SimpleJson.SimpleJson
member.summary:
This class encodes and decodes JSON strings. Spec. details, see http://www.json.org/
JSON uses Arrays and Objects. These correspond here to the datatypes JsonArray(IList<object>) and JsonObject(IDictionary<string,object>). All numbers are parsed to doubles.

member.name: M:SimpleJson.SimpleJson.DeserializeObject(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value
member.returns: An IList<object>, a IDictionary<string,object>, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:SimpleJson.SimpleJson.TryDeserializeObject(System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Try parsing the json string into a value.
member.returns: Returns true if successfull otherwise false.

member.name: M:SimpleJson.SimpleJson.SerializeObject(System.Object,SimpleJson.IJsonSerializerStrategy,System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Converts a IDictionary<string,object> / IList<object> object into a JSON string
member.returns: A JSON encoded string, or null if object 'json' is not serializable
